description:
5/99 Bunya Road Everton Hills

This ultra-modern hard to find 4 bed, 2 bath, 2 car town house will undoubtably impress you upon inspection. Located in the heart of Everton Hills in a quiet boutique complex, the property boasts brilliantly designed open plan living, quality finishes throughout and the perfect lay out for family or corporates alike.

The property features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, rangehood and an electric stove top. There is ample counter space with stone bench tops doubling as a breakfast bar. An additional bult-in window between kitchen and lounge and the neutral colour scheme supports that perfect open plan lay out and helps shed natural light throughout.

For those of you who love to the flexibility of indoor/outdoor living, a covered alfresco area flows beautifully from the downstairs living area, and there is a generous, fully fenced back yard for the kids to play to their hearts content!
The home is located only moments from Prince of Peace College, local sporting fields and tranquil parklands perfect for that daily exercise or relaxing walk after a busy day.
Public transport is easily accessible from Bunya Rd, and you are a short 10-minute drive from Westfield Chermside Shopping Centre and the Prince Charles Hospital.

Property features:
* Modern kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and an electric stove top
*Open plan living/ dining area with separate family area
* Ducted air conditioning and ceiling fans throughout
* Large covered entertaining area
* Private, secure and quiet complex.
* Main bedroom with a walk-in wardrobe and private ensuite
* 2nd bedroom with balcony and all rooms with ceiling fans and built -ins
* Ample storage space upstairs and downstairs
* A large, fully fenced grassed yard
* Secure remote-controlled garage for two cars
* 3rd toilet in garage
* Nbn box ready to go
* Body corporate Approx - $599/quarter

Confirmed school catchment zones: Grovely State School & Mitchelton State High School.
